short_summary: Contaminated Sites Risk Assessment and Risk Management Services
description: There are two separate solicitation documents on CanadaBuys for this requirement: Solicitation EZ897-240775-A aimed at the Contaminated Sites Risk Assessment and Risk Management Services and EZ897-240775-B under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business set-aside program. The Environmental Services and Contaminated Sites Management (ESCSM) Branch of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement for Contaminated Sites Risk Assessment and Risk Management Services in British Columbia  and Yukon Territory.
full_summary:
=====================================

Tender Title: EZ897-240775 - Contaminated Sites Risk Assessment and Risk Management Services
------------------------------------

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

**End-User Entity:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

**Notice Description:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) seeks to engage private sector expertise to conduct contaminated site risk assessment and risk management services in British Columbia and Yukon Territory.

Two separate solicitation documents are available on CanadaBuys:

1. Solicitation EZ897-240775-A: This solicitation targets general industry for the provision of Contaminated Sites Risk Assessment and Risk Management Services.
2. Solicitation EZ897-240775-B: This solicitation is specifically set aside for Indigenous-owned businesses under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).

**Publication and Closing Dates:**
Publication Date: 19 April 2024
Tender Closing Date: 03 June 2024, 14:00 (ET)

**Contract Details:**
Expected Contract Start Date: 29 July 2024
Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified

**Tender Status:**
This tender has expired, and a contract has likely been awarded. It is recommended that interested parties contact the contracting entity to inquire about future opportunities.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is open to Canadian companies, and relevant trade agreements include Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA).

**Contracting Contact:**
Katie Wong (SPAC/PSPC)
katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

---
